column4: i am unable to install bin files on my PC... ubuntu7.10... i made them executable by chmod and when i execute it with "./filename.bin"  it says no such file or directory...
qzio.. the file is on my desktop... i got a         "bash: ./home/ayush/Desktop/ge.bin: No such file or directory"
there is no '.' in front of /home   /home   not ./home
